msContents.summary: The record of transactions of the royal dockyard workshop at This. P. Hearst 03 is believed to be from the reign of Sesostris I, owing to the association of certain officials mentioned in the text with that reign.

msItemStruct.note: The Papyrus appears to have been composed of six sheets (making 5 kollesis). According to Reisner, the material is somewhat coarser and the color somewhat darker than the Hekanakhte archive. Section C on the recto has beend ruled horizontally in order to present information in a table.
Between Year 15, I Peret and Year 18, II Shemu 20 of an unnamed ruler whom Reisner presumes is Sesostris I.
Bancroft Library, Univ. of Calif., Berkeley
